description: Specific version of a file. Immutable.

url.description: URL where the encrypted file blob can be downloaded, usually a skylink (sia://)

key.description: The secret key used to encrypt this file, base64Url-encoded

encryptionType.description: Which algorithm is used to encrypt and decrypt this file

chunkSize.description: maxiumum size of every unencrypted file chunk in bytes

hash.description: Multihash of the unencrypted file, starts with 1220 for sha256

ts.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when this version was added to the FileSystem DAC
